item.title: Title Sequence
item.description: Winner of the Downbeat Jazz Vocal Soloist award, Monica is quickly making a name for herself in the New England area. With a Bachelor's from the Eastman School of Music and a Master's from the New England Conservatory, Monica has impeccable intonation, a crystal voice, and great skill at improvisation. She released her debut CD, If You Never Come To Me, on Brownstone Recordings.
